name: GALACTIC SPACE R0XX
description:
How long can you suspend your eternal demise?

SPACE R0XX is a top down endless Asteroids style game.  Test your skill against endless waves of asteroids and other meteoric obstacles.

Featuring: 

- 2 original soundtracks

- Objectively cool visuals and sounds

- Multiple enemy types

- Standalone Spawnset editor

Use the spawnset editor to dictate by yourself what enemy spawns when to recreate your favorite space battles.   

I used this pixel planet generator for the rotating earth and for one of the enemies that come up late in the game.
